original_text: You must stay at the entrance to the tent of meeting day and night for seven days and do what the Lord requires, so you will not die; for that is what I have been commanded.”
korean_text: 너희는 칠 주야를 회막 문에 머물면서 여호와께서 지키라고 하신 것을 지키라 그리하면 사망을 면하리라 내가 이같이 명령을 받았느니라

sentences.original_text: You must stay at the entrance to the tent of meeting
day and night for seven days
and do what the Lord requires
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 주께서 요구하시는 것을 행해야 한다

sentences.original_text: for that is what I have been commanded
